title: How do I commute?
content: I live in Akshayanagar and ec campus is way closer than rr. Idk if I will get RR aiml or not in tmrw counseling ,but parents are telling to not take it because the campus is very far and the bus comes at 6:40 am to Meenakshi temple ( 1hr travel). Even from scooty it will take a long time becaz of the huge traffic. I don't know how I will stay back at the campus for club activities etc. as the commute is expensive and time consuming. I know rr campus is marginally better than ec but idk what to do in such scenario.

comments.body: Ec = rr basically, so going with cae in ec is prolly better becuase ur going to be wasting around a 1000hours or 45 days u could have spent studying or having fun
okay ty. Academics are same but I guess I will be missing out on better clubs/ fests then right?
Ec students can still go to RR and attend fests and events. So if some sound interesting to you, you may visit RR (and vice versa)
